comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Artfact www.artfact.com/auction-lot/post-cards-theatre,-germany,-... indicates that a batch of postcards up for auction in 2000 was described as: "[ Post Cards ] THEATRE, Germany, RP selection, inc. Georg Reimers, Willy Hesch, Victor Kutschera, Thomas Koschat, Gerda Walde, Klara VonKrug, Carola Rechberg, Hans Koppe, Richard Trunk, Rudolf Rittner, Clea Cillyte, Hella Orlon etc., VR, 100* So perhaps she was a German actress. coins.delcampe.net/page/item/id,0056888144,language,G.html appears to be another picture of her by a photographer/studio in Munich.
